## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
system("R CMD INSTALL ggswissmaps_0.0.3.tar.gz")
```

## Content

First of all, load the package:
```{r}
library(ggswissmaps)
```

We can use the `ls` function to look at the content:
```{r}
ls("package:ggswissmaps")
```

Or launch the help:
```{r eval = FALSE}
utils::help(package = "ggswissmaps")
```


There is some data:
```{r}
data(package = "ggswissmaps")
```




## Examples

### Using the data

```{r}
data("shp_df")
class(shp_df)
length(shp_df)
names(shp_df)

# Data description
?shp_df
```
